Maverick AV Solutions with:
WorkSpace Intelligence: Bringing the Smart to Smart Meetings

Futureproofing the meeting environment – optimise your customer’s meetings with WorkSpace Intelligence on the Windows Collaboration Displays (WCD).

What is WorkSpace Intelligence?

  • Provides real time analytics of conditions in meeting spaces
  • Runs on Windows Collaboration Displays (WCD) and W series products using built-in IoT sensors
  • Preconfigured and also customisable browser-based dashboard
  • Subscription based solution, licensed per display

What’s in it for the end user customer?

  • Provides real time analytics
  • Is entirely cloud based
  • Enables environment optimisation
  • 90-day trial license for free
  • Avocor Aquarius WorkSpace Intelligence is key to maximising the benefits of WCD
  • State of the art, simple to use interface
  • Quick to install, no custom programming needed
  • Unlimited users per display account

What is the opportunity for the channel?

  • Ready to sell - 10 minutes to set up vis a URL link on the display
  • Reoccurring revenue opportunity with automatic license renewals
  • Low touch as customer can quickly and simply set up their own Avocor Aquarius WorkSpace Intelligence account
  • A great enabler to help you sell more displays

So how does WorkSpace Intelligence measure up?

WorkSpace Intelligence measures:

  1. Temperature: Provides insights into the room temperature and how the time of day or number of occupants impacts it.
  2. Room usage: Detects the presence of any people in the room to help manage room resources*
  3. Ambient light: Automatically measures the level of light to aid decisions on room environment and provide energy savings
  4. Air quality: Continually measure levels of eCO2 to gain insights on how to provide the best possible working environment

* Does not count number of occupants, just detection of whether room is occupied
